title: Bloodlust: The Shield Maiden
description: A FORGOTTEN LAND, A LEGION IN PERIL, TWO UNTESTED CHOSEN  In the Domains of the Chosen magic is power.  As Gavin and Sadira try to adapt to their new positions, the former Gladiatrix Vintia sets sail with an expedition that will reshape the future of the empire. Following in the footsteps of her father, a famed soldier, Vintia seeks a new home as a Warbound in the Legions. Her choice binds her to Chosen Brightloch, who has found the way to Ithal'Duin, a continent lost since The Reckoning. New dangers await them there, but so do new allies and new opportunities. It is up to Vintia and the Ninth Legion to safeguard this expedition. Yet, while the Legions faces strange foes, the politics of the Chosen will prove to be an even greater danger.  AUTHORS NOTE  Originally this book was released as Warbound: The Shield Maiden, if you have that edition, you do not need to update.
author: C.P.D. Harris
